b: ^ Boss! This knight here is dangerous! Impossible to fool him!
^ Haha! My clairvoyance never fails me! You were there, Dragon!

Encounter1: ^Very well, compose yourself minion, I will take care of the matter.
^Ah! Finally, the main course, I was starting to get bored!
^You took the words right out of my mouth, knight. Finally a worthy opponent.
^I, Sir Pierre, blessed by the supreme vision, challenge you to a duel, Dragon. You stand no chance.
Regen: ^HA! I bet you won't even be able to take down my army to reach me!
^Very well, you'll see, your monsters won't be enough to stop me.
^I'll take pleasure in getting rid of them.
Damages: ^So I guess you'll allow me to heal myself for a moment... You wouldn't refuse a fair duel, would you?
^But of course, Dragon. Please, that won't be enough against me anyway.
Encounter2: ^Sir Pierre, for once, I'm glad to see an adventurer survive my traps!
^Our last battle was magnificent, Dragon, I look forward to facing you again.
^Haha! Pleasure shared, knight, but you won't win!
^We'll see... What are the rules this time?
^Make him face your minions ($$the hero$$ gains @courageous@)
Regen2: ^Perfect, I'll face your army before you in that case. They won't last long!
Damages2: ^Very well, take your time, we're not in a hurry.
